57#define SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI_N 40
58#define SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI_Z 16
59#define SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI 8
60
61static void
62sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(struct sctp_association *assoc, struct sctp_nets *net)
63{
64 if ((assoc->max_cwnd > 0) &&
65 (net->cwnd > assoc->max_cwnd) &&
66 (net->cwnd > (net->mtu - sizeof(struct sctphdr)))) {
67 net->cwnd = assoc->max_cwnd;
68 if (net->cwnd < (net->mtu - sizeof(struct sctphdr))) {
69 net->cwnd = net->mtu - sizeof(struct sctphdr);
70 }
71 }
72}
73
74static void
75sctp_set_initial_cc_param(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
76{
77 struct sctp_association *assoc;
78 uint32_t cwnd_in_mtu;
79
80 assoc = &stcb->asoc;
81 cwnd_in_mtu = SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_initial_cwnd);
82 if (cwnd_in_mtu == 0) {
83 /* Using 0 means that the value of RFC 4960 is used. */
84 net->cwnd = min((net->mtu * 4), max((2 * net->mtu), SCTP_INITIAL_CWND));
85 } else {
86 /*
87 * We take the minimum of the burst limit and the
88 * initial congestion window.
89 */
90 if ((assoc->max_burst > 0) && (cwnd_in_mtu > assoc->max_burst))
91 cwnd_in_mtu = assoc->max_burst;
92 net->cwnd = (net->mtu - sizeof(struct sctphdr)) * cwnd_in_mtu;
93 }
94 if ((stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV1) ||
95 (stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV2)) {
96 /* In case of resource pooling initialize appropriately */
97 net->cwnd /= assoc->numnets;
98 if (net->cwnd < (net->mtu - sizeof(struct sctphdr))) {
99 net->cwnd = net->mtu - sizeof(struct sctphdr);
100 }
101 }
102 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(assoc, net);
103 net->ssthresh = assoc->peers_rwnd;
104#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
105 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, init,
106 stcb->asoc.my_vtag, ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)), net,
107 0, net->cwnd);
108#endif
109 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) &
110 (SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE|SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE)) {
111 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, 0, SCTP_CWND_INITIALIZATION);
112 }
113}
114
115static void
116sctp_cwnd_update_after_fr(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
117 struct sctp_association *asoc)
118{
119 struct sctp_nets *net;
120 uint32_t t_ssthresh, t_cwnd;
121 uint64_t t_ucwnd_sbw;
122
123 /* MT FIXME: Don't compute this over and over again */
124 t_ssthresh = 0;
125 t_cwnd = 0;
126 t_ucwnd_sbw = 0;
127 if ((asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV1) ||
128 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV2)) {
129 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &asoc->nets, sctp_next) {
130 t_ssthresh += net->ssthresh;
131 t_cwnd += net->cwnd;
132 if (net->lastsa > 0) {
133 t_ucwnd_sbw += (uint64_t)net->cwnd / (uint64_t)net->lastsa;
134 }
135 }
136 if (t_ucwnd_sbw == 0) {
137 t_ucwnd_sbw = 1;
138 }
139 }
140
141 /*-
142 * CMT fast recovery code. Need to debug. ((sctp_cmt_on_off > 0) &&
143 * (net->fast_retran_loss_recovery == 0)))
144 */
145 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &asoc->nets, sctp_next) {
146 if ((asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery == 0) ||
147 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off > 0)) {
148 /* out of a RFC2582 Fast recovery window? */
149 if (net->net_ack > 0) {
150 /*
151 * per section 7.2.3, are there any
152 * destinations that had a fast retransmit
153 * to them. If so what we need to do is
154 * adjust ssthresh and cwnd.
155 */
156 struct sctp_tmit_chunk *lchk;
157 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
158
159 if ((asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV1) ||
160 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV2)) {
161 if (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV1) {
162 net->ssthresh = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)4 *
163 (uint64_t)net->mtu *
164 (uint64_t)net->ssthresh) /
165 (uint64_t)t_ssthresh);
166 }
167 if (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV2) {
168 uint32_t srtt;
169
170 srtt = net->lastsa;
171 /* lastsa>>3; we don't need to devide ...*/
172 if (srtt == 0) {
173 srtt = 1;
174 }
175 /* Short Version => Equal to Contel Version MBe */
176 net->ssthresh = (uint32_t) (((uint64_t)4 *
177 (uint64_t)net->mtu *
178 (uint64_t)net->cwnd) /
179 ((uint64_t)srtt *
180 t_ucwnd_sbw));
181 /* INCREASE FACTOR */;
182 }
183 if ((net->cwnd > t_cwnd / 2) &&
184 (net->ssthresh < net->cwnd - t_cwnd / 2)) {
185 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd - t_cwnd / 2;
186 }
187 if (net->ssthresh < net->mtu) {
188 net->ssthresh = net->mtu;
189 }
190 } else {
191 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd / 2;
192 if (net->ssthresh < (net->mtu * 2)) {
193 net->ssthresh = 2 * net->mtu;
194 }
195 }
196 net->cwnd = net->ssthresh;
197 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(asoc, net);
198#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
199 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, fr,
200 stcb->asoc.my_vtag, ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)), net,
201 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
202#endif
203 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
204 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd),
205 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_FR);
206 }
207 lchk = TAILQ_FIRST(&asoc->send_queue);
208
209 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
210 /* Turn on fast recovery window */
211 asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery = 1;
212 if (lchk == NULL) {
213 /* Mark end of the window */
214 asoc->fast_recovery_tsn = asoc->sending_seq - 1;
215 } else {
216 asoc->fast_recovery_tsn = lchk->rec.data.tsn - 1;
217 }
218
219 /*
220 * CMT fast recovery -- per destination
221 * recovery variable.
222 */
223 net->fast_retran_loss_recovery = 1;
224
225 if (lchk == NULL) {
226 /* Mark end of the window */
227 net->fast_recovery_tsn = asoc->sending_seq - 1;
228 } else {
229 net->fast_recovery_tsn = lchk->rec.data.tsn - 1;
230 }
231
232 sctp_timer_stop(SCTP_TIMER_TYPE_SEND,
233 stcb->sctp_ep, stcb, net,
234 SCTP_FROM_SCTP_CC_FUNCTIONS + SCTP_LOC_1);
235 sctp_timer_start(SCTP_TIMER_TYPE_SEND,
236 stcb->sctp_ep, stcb, net);
237 }
238 } else if (net->net_ack > 0) {
239 /*
240 * Mark a peg that we WOULD have done a cwnd
241 * reduction but RFC2582 prevented this action.
242 */
243 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_fastretransinrtt);
244 }
245 }
246}
247
248/* Defines for instantaneous bw decisions */
249#define SCTP_INST_LOOSING 1 /* Losing to other flows */
250#define SCTP_INST_NEUTRAL 2 /* Neutral, no indication */
251#define SCTP_INST_GAINING 3 /* Gaining, step down possible */
252
253#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
254static int
255cc_bw_same(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net, uint64_t nbw,
256 uint64_t rtt_offset, uint64_t vtag, uint8_t inst_ind)
257#else
258static int
259cc_bw_same(struct sctp_tcb *stcb SCTP_UNUSED, struct sctp_nets *net, uint64_t nbw,
260 uint64_t rtt_offset, uint8_t inst_ind)
261#endif
262{
263#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
264 uint64_t oth, probepoint;
265#endif
266
267#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
268 probepoint = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << 32);
269#endif
270 if (net->rtt > net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt + rtt_offset) {
271 /*
272 * rtt increased
273 * we don't update bw.. so we don't
274 * update the rtt either.
275 */
276#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
277 /* Probe point 5 */
278 probepoint |= ((5 << 16) | 1);
279 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
280 vtag,
281 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
282 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
283 net->flight_size,
284 probepoint);
285#endif
286 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) && (inst_ind != SCTP_INST_LOOSING)) {
287 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state == 5)
288 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt++;
289 else
290 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 1;
291 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 5;
292 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt == net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) ||
293 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt > net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) &&
294 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt % net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) == 0))) {
295 /* Try a step down */
296#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
297 oth = net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce;
298 oth <<= 16;
299 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt;
300 oth <<= 16;
301 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state;
302 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttstep,
303 vtag,
304 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
305 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
306 oth,
307 probepoint);
308#endif
309 if (net->cwnd > (4 * net->mtu)) {
310 net->cwnd -= net->mtu;
311 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce++;
312 } else {
313 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
314 }
315 }
316 }
317 return (1);
318 }
319 if (net->rtt < net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt-rtt_offset) {
320 /*
321 * rtt decreased, there could be more room.
322 * we update both the bw and the rtt here to
323 * lock this in as a good step down.
324 */
325#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
326 /* Probe point 6 */
327 probepoint |= ((6 << 16) | 0);
328 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
329 vtag,
330 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
331 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
332 net->flight_size,
333 probepoint);
334#endif
335 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) {
336#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
337 oth = net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce;
338 oth <<= 16;
339 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt;
340 oth <<= 16;
341 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state;
342 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttstep,
343 vtag,
344 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
345 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
346 oth,
347 probepoint);
348#endif
349 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state == 5) &&
350 (net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt > net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step)) {
351 /* Step down worked */
352 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
353 return (1);
354 } else {
355 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 6;
356 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
357 }
358 }
359 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw = nbw;
360 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt = net->rtt;
361 net->cc_mod.rtcc.cwnd_at_bw_set = net->cwnd;
362 if (inst_ind == SCTP_INST_GAINING)
363 return (1);
364 else if (inst_ind == SCTP_INST_NEUTRAL)
365 return (1);
366 else
367 return (0);
368 }
369 /* Ok bw and rtt remained the same .. no update to any
370 */
371#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
372 /* Probe point 7 */
373 probepoint |= ((7 << 16) | net->cc_mod.rtcc.ret_from_eq);
374 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
375 vtag,
376 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
377 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
378 net->flight_size,
379 probepoint);
380#endif
381 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) && (inst_ind != SCTP_INST_LOOSING)) {
382 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state == 5)
383 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt++;
384 else
385 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 1;
386 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 5;
387 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt == net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) ||
388 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt > net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) &&
389 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt % net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) == 0))) {
390 /* Try a step down */
391 if (net->cwnd > (4 * net->mtu)) {
392 net->cwnd -= net->mtu;
393 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce++;
394 return (1);
395 } else {
396 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
397 }
398 }
399 }
400 if (inst_ind == SCTP_INST_GAINING)
401 return (1);
402 else if (inst_ind == SCTP_INST_NEUTRAL)
403 return (1);
404 else
405 return ((int)net->cc_mod.rtcc.ret_from_eq);
406}
407
408#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
409static int
410cc_bw_decrease(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net, uint64_t nbw, uint64_t rtt_offset,
411 uint64_t vtag, uint8_t inst_ind)
412#else
413static int
414cc_bw_decrease(struct sctp_tcb *stcb SCTP_UNUSED, struct sctp_nets *net, uint64_t nbw, uint64_t rtt_offset,
415 uint8_t inst_ind)
416#endif
417{
418#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
419 uint64_t oth, probepoint;
420#endif
421
422 /* Bandwidth decreased.*/
423#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
424 probepoint = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << 32);
425#endif
426 if (net->rtt > net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt+rtt_offset) {
427 /* rtt increased */
428 /* Did we add more */
429 if ((net->cwnd > net->cc_mod.rtcc.cwnd_at_bw_set) &&
430 (inst_ind != SCTP_INST_LOOSING)) {
431 /* We caused it maybe.. back off? */
432#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
433 /* PROBE POINT 1 */
434 probepoint |= ((1 << 16) | 1);
435 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
436 vtag,
437 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
438 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
439 net->flight_size,
440 probepoint);
441#endif
442 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.ret_from_eq) {
443 /* Switch over to CA if we are less aggressive */
444 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd-1;
445 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
446 }
447 return (1);
448 }
449#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
450 /* Probe point 2 */
451 probepoint |= ((2 << 16) | 0);
452 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
453 vtag,
454 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
455 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
456 net->flight_size,
457 probepoint);
458#endif
459 /* Someone else - fight for more? */
460 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) {
461#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
462 oth = net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce;
463 oth <<= 16;
464 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt;
465 oth <<= 16;
466 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state;
467 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttstep,
468 vtag,
469 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
470 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
471 oth,
472 probepoint);
473#endif
474 /* Did we voluntarily give up some? if so take
475 * one back please
476 */
477 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce) &&
478 (inst_ind != SCTP_INST_GAINING)) {
479 net->cwnd += net->mtu;
480 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
481 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce--;
482 }
483 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 2;
484 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
485 }
486 goto out_decision;
487 } else if (net->rtt < net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt-rtt_offset) {
488 /* bw & rtt decreased */
489#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
490 /* Probe point 3 */
491 probepoint |= ((3 << 16) | 0);
492 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
493 vtag,
494 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
495 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
496 net->flight_size,
497 probepoint);
498#endif
499 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) {
500#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
501 oth = net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce;
502 oth <<= 16;
503 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt;
504 oth <<= 16;
505 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state;
506 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttstep,
507 vtag,
508 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
509 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
510 oth,
511 probepoint);
512#endif
513 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce) &&
514 (inst_ind != SCTP_INST_GAINING)) {
515 net->cwnd += net->mtu;
516 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
517 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce--;
518 }
519 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 3;
520 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
521 }
522 goto out_decision;
523 }
524 /* The bw decreased but rtt stayed the same */
525#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
526 /* Probe point 4 */
527 probepoint |= ((4 << 16) | 0);
528 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
529 vtag,
530 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
531 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
532 net->flight_size,
533 probepoint);
534#endif
535 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) {
536#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
537 oth = net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce;
538 oth <<= 16;
539 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt;
540 oth <<= 16;
541 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state;
542 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttstep,
543 vtag,
544 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
545 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
546 oth,
547 probepoint);
548#endif
549 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce) &&
550 (inst_ind != SCTP_INST_GAINING)) {
551 net->cwnd += net->mtu;
552 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
553 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce--;
554 }
555 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 4;
556 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
557 }
558out_decision:
559 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw = nbw;
560 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt = net->rtt;
561 net->cc_mod.rtcc.cwnd_at_bw_set = net->cwnd;
562 if (inst_ind == SCTP_INST_GAINING) {
563 return (1);
564 } else {
565 return (0);
566 }
567}
568
569#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
570static int
571cc_bw_increase(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net, uint64_t nbw, uint64_t vtag)
572#else
573static int
574cc_bw_increase(struct sctp_tcb *stcb SCTP_UNUSED, struct sctp_nets *net, uint64_t nbw)
575#endif
576{
577#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
578 uint64_t oth, probepoint;
579
580#endif
581 /* BW increased, so update and
582 * return 0, since all actions in
583 * our table say to do the normal CC
584 * update. Note that we pay no attention to
585 * the inst_ind since our overall sum is increasing.
586 */
587#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
588 /* PROBE POINT 0 */
589 probepoint = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << 32);
590 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
591 vtag,
592 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
593 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
594 net->flight_size,
595 probepoint);
596#endif
597 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) {
598#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
599 oth = net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce;
600 oth <<= 16;
601 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt;
602 oth <<= 16;
603 oth |= net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state;
604 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttstep,
605 vtag,
606 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | nbw),
607 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
608 oth,
609 probepoint);
610#endif
611 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 0;
612 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
613 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce = 0;
614 }
615 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw = nbw;
616 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt = net->rtt;
617 net->cc_mod.rtcc.cwnd_at_bw_set = net->cwnd;
618 return (0);
619}
620
621/* RTCC Algorithm to limit growth of cwnd, return
622 * true if you want to NOT allow cwnd growth
623 */
624static int
625cc_bw_limit(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net, uint64_t nbw)
626{
627 uint64_t bw_offset, rtt_offset;
628#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
629 uint64_t probepoint, rtt, vtag;
630#endif
631 uint64_t bytes_for_this_rtt, inst_bw;
632 uint64_t div, inst_off;
633 int bw_shift;
634 uint8_t inst_ind;
635 int ret;
636 /*-
637 * Here we need to see if we want
638 * to limit cwnd growth due to increase
639 * in overall rtt but no increase in bw.
640 * We use the following table to figure
641 * out what we should do. When we return
642 * 0, cc update goes on as planned. If we
643 * return 1, then no cc update happens and cwnd
644 * stays where it is at.
645 * ----------------------------------
646 * BW | RTT | Action
647 * *********************************
648 * INC | INC | return 0
649 * ----------------------------------
650 * INC | SAME | return 0
651 * ----------------------------------
652 * INC | DECR | return 0
653 * ----------------------------------
654 * SAME | INC | return 1
655 * ----------------------------------
656 * SAME | SAME | return 1
657 * ----------------------------------
658 * SAME | DECR | return 0
659 * ----------------------------------
660 * DECR | INC | return 0 or 1 based on if we caused.
661 * ----------------------------------
662 * DECR | SAME | return 0
663 * ----------------------------------
664 * DECR | DECR | return 0
665 * ----------------------------------
666 *
667 * We are a bit fuzz on what an increase or
668 * decrease is. For BW it is the same if
669 * it did not change within 1/64th. For
670 * RTT it stayed the same if it did not
671 * change within 1/32nd
672 */
673 bw_shift = SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_rttvar_bw);
674#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
675 rtt = stcb->asoc.my_vtag;
676 vtag = (rtt << 32) | (((uint32_t)(stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport)) << 16) | (stcb->rport);
677 probepoint = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << 32);
678 rtt = net->rtt;
679#endif
680 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.rtt_set_this_sack) {
681 net->cc_mod.rtcc.rtt_set_this_sack = 0;
682 bytes_for_this_rtt = net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes - net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes_at_last_rttc;
683 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes_at_last_rttc = net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes;
684 if (net->rtt) {
685 div = net->rtt / 1000;
686 if (div) {
687 inst_bw = bytes_for_this_rtt / div;
688 inst_off = inst_bw >> bw_shift;
689 if (inst_bw > nbw)
690 inst_ind = SCTP_INST_GAINING;
691 else if ((inst_bw+inst_off) < nbw)
692 inst_ind = SCTP_INST_LOOSING;
693 else
694 inst_ind = SCTP_INST_NEUTRAL;
695#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
696 probepoint |= ((0xb << 16) | inst_ind);
697#endif
698 } else {
699 inst_ind = net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_inst_ind;
700#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
701 inst_bw = bytes_for_this_rtt / (uint64_t)(net->rtt);
702 /* Can't determine do not change */
703 probepoint |= ((0xc << 16) | inst_ind);
704#endif
705 }
706 } else {
707 inst_ind = net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_inst_ind;
708#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
709 inst_bw = bytes_for_this_rtt;
710 /* Can't determine do not change */
711 probepoint |= ((0xd << 16) | inst_ind);
712#endif
713 }
714#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
715 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
716 vtag,
717 ((nbw << 32) | inst_bw),
718 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | rtt),
719 net->flight_size,
720 probepoint);
721#endif
722 } else {
723 /* No rtt measurement, use last one */
724 inst_ind = net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_inst_ind;
725 }
726 bw_offset = net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw >> bw_shift;
727 if (nbw > net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw + bw_offset) {
728#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
729 ret = cc_bw_increase(stcb, net, nbw, vtag);
730#else
731 ret = cc_bw_increase(stcb, net, nbw);
732#endif
733 goto out;
734 }
735 rtt_offset = net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt >> SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_rttvar_rtt);
736 if (nbw < net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw - bw_offset) {
737#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
738 ret = cc_bw_decrease(stcb, net, nbw, rtt_offset, vtag, inst_ind);
739#else
740 ret = cc_bw_decrease(stcb, net, nbw, rtt_offset, inst_ind);
741#endif
742 goto out;
743 }
744 /* If we reach here then
745 * we are in a situation where
746 * the bw stayed the same.
747 */
748#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
749 ret = cc_bw_same(stcb, net, nbw, rtt_offset, vtag, inst_ind);
750#else
751 ret = cc_bw_same(stcb, net, nbw, rtt_offset, inst_ind);
752#endif
753out:
754 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_inst_ind = inst_ind;
755 return (ret);
756}
757
758static void
759sctp_cwnd_update_after_sack_common(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
760 struct sctp_association *asoc,
761 int accum_moved, int reneged_all SCTP_UNUSED, int will_exit, int use_rtcc)
762{
763 struct sctp_nets *net;
764#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
765 int old_cwnd;
766#endif
767 uint32_t t_ssthresh, t_cwnd, incr;
768 uint64_t t_ucwnd_sbw;
769 uint64_t t_path_mptcp;
770 uint64_t mptcp_like_alpha;
771 uint32_t srtt;
772 uint64_t max_path;
773
774 /* MT FIXME: Don't compute this over and over again */
775 t_ssthresh = 0;
776 t_cwnd = 0;
777 t_ucwnd_sbw = 0;
778 t_path_mptcp = 0;
779 mptcp_like_alpha = 1;
780 if ((stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV1) ||
781 (stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV2) ||
782 (stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_MPTCP)) {
783 max_path = 0;
784 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &stcb->asoc.nets, sctp_next) {
785 t_ssthresh += net->ssthresh;
786 t_cwnd += net->cwnd;
787 /* lastsa>>3; we don't need to devide ...*/
788 srtt = net->lastsa;
789 if (srtt > 0) {
790 uint64_t tmp;
791
792 t_ucwnd_sbw += (uint64_t)net->cwnd / (uint64_t)srtt;
793 t_path_mptcp += (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI_Z) /
794 (((uint64_t)net->mtu) * (uint64_t)srtt);
795 tmp = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI_N) /
796 ((uint64_t)net->mtu * (uint64_t)(srtt * srtt));
797 if (tmp > max_path) {
798 max_path = tmp;
799 }
800 }
801 }
802 if (t_path_mptcp > 0) {
803 mptcp_like_alpha = max_path / (t_path_mptcp * t_path_mptcp);
804 } else {
805 mptcp_like_alpha = 1;
806 }
807 }
808 if (t_ssthresh == 0) {
809 t_ssthresh = 1;
810 }
811 if (t_ucwnd_sbw == 0) {
812 t_ucwnd_sbw = 1;
813 }
814 /******************************/
815 /* update cwnd and Early FR */
816 /******************************/
817 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &asoc->nets, sctp_next) {
818#ifdef JANA_CMT_FAST_RECOVERY
819 /*
820 * CMT fast recovery code. Need to debug.
821 */
822 if (net->fast_retran_loss_recovery && net->new_pseudo_cumack) {
823 if (SCTP_TSN_GE(asoc->last_acked_seq, net->fast_recovery_tsn) ||
824 SCTP_TSN_GE(net->pseudo_cumack,net->fast_recovery_tsn)) {
825 net->will_exit_fast_recovery = 1;
826 }
827 }
828#endif
829 /* if nothing was acked on this destination skip it */
830 if (net->net_ack == 0) {
831 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
832 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, 0, SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SACK);
833 }
834 continue;
835 }
836#ifdef JANA_CMT_FAST_RECOVERY
837 /* CMT fast recovery code
838 */
839 /*
840 if (sctp_cmt_on_off > 0 && net->fast_retran_loss_recovery && net->will_exit_fast_recovery == 0) {
841 @@@ Do something
842 }
843 else if (sctp_cmt_on_off == 0 && asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery && will_exit == 0) {
844 */
845#endif
846
847 if (asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery &&
848 (will_exit == 0) &&
849 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == 0)) {
850 /*
851 * If we are in loss recovery we skip any cwnd
852 * update
853 */
854 return;
855 }
856 /*
857 * Did any measurements go on for this network?
858 */
859 if (use_rtcc && (net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls_needs_set > 0)) {
860 uint64_t nbw;
861 /*
862 * At this point our bw_bytes has been updated
863 * by incoming sack information.
864 *
865 * But our bw may not yet be set.
866 *
867 */
868 if ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.new_tot_time/1000) > 0) {
869 nbw = net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes/(net->cc_mod.rtcc.new_tot_time/1000);
870 } else {
871 nbw = net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes;
872 }
873 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw) {
874 if (cc_bw_limit(stcb, net, nbw)) {
875 /* Hold here, no update */
876 continue;
877 }
878 } else {
879#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
880 uint64_t vtag, probepoint;
881
882 probepoint = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << 32);
883 probepoint |= ((0xa << 16) | 0);
884 vtag = (net->rtt << 32) |
885 (((uint32_t)(stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport)) << 16) |
886 (stcb->rport);
887
888 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
889 vtag,
890 nbw,
891 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
892 net->flight_size,
893 probepoint);
894#endif
895 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw = nbw;
896 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt = net->rtt;
897 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.rtt_set_this_sack) {
898 net->cc_mod.rtcc.rtt_set_this_sack = 0;
899 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes_at_last_rttc = net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes;
900 }
901 }
902 }
903 /*
904 * CMT: CUC algorithm. Update cwnd if pseudo-cumack has
905 * moved.
906 */
907 if (accum_moved ||
908 ((asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off > 0) && net->new_pseudo_cumack)) {
909 /* If the cumulative ack moved we can proceed */
910 if (net->cwnd <= net->ssthresh) {
911 /* We are in slow start */
912 if (net->flight_size + net->net_ack >= net->cwnd) {
913 uint32_t limit;
914
915#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
916 old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
917#endif
918 switch (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off) {
919 case SCTP_CMT_RPV1:
920 limit = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)net->mtu *
921 (uint64_t)SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_L2_abc_variable) *
922 (uint64_t)net->ssthresh) /
923 (uint64_t)t_ssthresh);
924 incr = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)net->net_ack *
925 (uint64_t)net->ssthresh) /
926 (uint64_t)t_ssthresh);
927 if (incr > limit) {
928 incr = limit;
929 }
930 if (incr == 0) {
931 incr = 1;
932 }
933 break;
934 case SCTP_CMT_RPV2:
935 /* lastsa>>3; we don't need to divide ...*/
936 srtt = net->lastsa;
937 if (srtt == 0) {
938 srtt = 1;
939 }
940 limit = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)net->mtu *
941 (uint64_t)SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_L2_abc_variable) *
942 (uint64_t)net->cwnd) /
943 ((uint64_t)srtt * t_ucwnd_sbw));
944 /* INCREASE FACTOR */
945 incr = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)net->net_ack *
946 (uint64_t)net->cwnd) /
947 ((uint64_t)srtt * t_ucwnd_sbw));
948 /* INCREASE FACTOR */
949 if (incr > limit) {
950 incr = limit;
951 }
952 if (incr == 0) {
953 incr = 1;
954 }
955 break;
956 case SCTP_CMT_MPTCP:
957 limit = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)net->mtu *
958 mptcp_like_alpha *
959 (uint64_t)SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_L2_abc_variable)) >>
960 SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI);
961 incr = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)net->net_ack *
962 mptcp_like_alpha) >>
963 SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI);
964 if (incr > limit) {
965 incr = limit;
966 }
967 if (incr > net->net_ack) {
968 incr = net->net_ack;
969 }
970 if (incr > net->mtu) {
971 incr = net->mtu;
972 }
973 break;
974 default:
975 incr = net->net_ack;
976 if (incr > net->mtu * SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_L2_abc_variable)) {
977 incr = net->mtu * SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_L2_abc_variable);
978 }
979 break;
980 }
981 net->cwnd += incr;
982 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(asoc, net);
983 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
984 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, incr,
985 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SS);
986 }
987#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
988 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, ack,
989 stcb->asoc.my_vtag,
990 ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)),
991 net,
992 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
993#endif
994 } else {
995 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
996 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->net_ack,
997 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NOADV_SS);
998 }
999 }
1000 } else {
1001 /* We are in congestion avoidance */
1002 /*
1003 * Add to pba
1004 */
1005 net->partial_bytes_acked += net->net_ack;
1006
1007 if ((net->flight_size + net->net_ack >= net->cwnd) &&
1008 (net->partial_bytes_acked >= net->cwnd)) {
1009 net->partial_bytes_acked -= net->cwnd;
1010#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1011 old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1012#endif
1013 switch (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off) {
1014 case SCTP_CMT_RPV1:
1015 incr = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)net->mtu *
1016 (uint64_t)net->ssthresh) /
1017 (uint64_t)t_ssthresh);
1018 if (incr == 0) {
1019 incr = 1;
1020 }
1021 break;
1022 case SCTP_CMT_RPV2:
1023 /* lastsa>>3; we don't need to divide ... */
1024 srtt = net->lastsa;
1025 if (srtt == 0) {
1026 srtt = 1;
1027 }
1028 incr = (uint32_t)((uint64_t)net->mtu *
1029 (uint64_t)net->cwnd /
1030 ((uint64_t)srtt *
1031 t_ucwnd_sbw));
1032 /* INCREASE FACTOR */
1033 if (incr == 0) {
1034 incr = 1;
1035 }
1036 break;
1037 case SCTP_CMT_MPTCP:
1038 incr = (uint32_t)((mptcp_like_alpha *
1039 (uint64_t) net->cwnd) >>
1040 SHIFT_MPTCP_MULTI);
1041 if (incr > net->mtu) {
1042 incr = net->mtu;
1043 }
1044 break;
1045 default:
1046 incr = net->mtu;
1047 break;
1048 }
1049 net->cwnd += incr;
1050 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(asoc, net);
1051#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1052 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, ack,
1053 stcb->asoc.my_vtag,
1054 ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)),
1055 net,
1056 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
1057#endif
1058 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1059 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->mtu,
1060 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_CA);
1061 }
1062 } else {
1063 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
1064 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->net_ack,
1065 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NOADV_CA);
1066 }
1067 }
1068 }
1069 } else {
1070 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
1071 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->mtu,
1072 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NO_CUMACK);
1073 }
1074 }
1075 }
1076}
1077
1078#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1079static void
1080sctp_cwnd_update_exit_pf_common(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
1081#else
1082static void
1083sctp_cwnd_update_exit_pf_common(struct sctp_tcb *stcb SCTP_UNUSED, struct sctp_nets *net)
1084#endif
1085{
1086#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1087 int old_cwnd;
1088
1089 old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1090#endif
1091 net->cwnd = net->mtu;
1092#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1093 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, ack,
1094 stcb->asoc.my_vtag, ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)), net,
1095 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
1096#endif
1097 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_INDATA1, "Destination %p moved from PF to reachable with cwnd %d.\n",
1098 (void *)net, net->cwnd);
1099}
1100
1101static void
1102sctp_cwnd_update_after_timeout(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
1103{
1104 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1105 uint32_t t_ssthresh, t_cwnd;
1106 uint64_t t_ucwnd_sbw;
1107
1108 /* MT FIXME: Don't compute this over and over again */
1109 t_ssthresh = 0;
1110 t_cwnd = 0;
1111 if ((stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV1) ||
1112 (stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV2)) {
1113 struct sctp_nets *lnet;
1114 uint32_t srtt;
1115
1116 t_ucwnd_sbw = 0;
1117 TAILQ_FOREACH(lnet, &stcb->asoc.nets, sctp_next) {
1118 t_ssthresh += lnet->ssthresh;
1119 t_cwnd += lnet->cwnd;
1120 srtt = lnet->lastsa;
1121 /* lastsa>>3; we don't need to divide ... */
1122 if (srtt > 0) {
1123 t_ucwnd_sbw += (uint64_t)lnet->cwnd / (uint64_t)srtt;
1124 }
1125 }
1126 if (t_ssthresh < 1) {
1127 t_ssthresh = 1;
1128 }
1129 if (t_ucwnd_sbw < 1) {
1130 t_ucwnd_sbw = 1;
1131 }
1132 if (stcb->asoc.sctp_cmt_on_off == SCTP_CMT_RPV1) {
1133 net->ssthresh = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)4 *
1134 (uint64_t)net->mtu *
1135 (uint64_t)net->ssthresh) /
1136 (uint64_t)t_ssthresh);
1137 } else {
1138 uint64_t cc_delta;
1139
1140 srtt = net->lastsa;
1141 /* lastsa>>3; we don't need to divide ... */
1142 if (srtt == 0) {
1143 srtt = 1;
1144 }
1145 cc_delta = t_ucwnd_sbw * (uint64_t)srtt / 2;
1146 if (cc_delta < t_cwnd) {
1147 net->ssthresh = (uint32_t)((uint64_t)t_cwnd - cc_delta);
1148 } else {
1149 net->ssthresh = net->mtu;
1150 }
1151 }
1152 if ((net->cwnd > t_cwnd / 2) &&
1153 (net->ssthresh < net->cwnd - t_cwnd / 2)) {
1154 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd - t_cwnd / 2;
1155 }
1156 if (net->ssthresh < net->mtu) {
1157 net->ssthresh = net->mtu;
1158 }
1159 } else {
1160 net->ssthresh = max(net->cwnd / 2, 4 * net->mtu);
1161 }
1162 net->cwnd = net->mtu;
1163 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
1164#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1165 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, to,
1166 stcb->asoc.my_vtag,
1167 ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)),
1168 net,
1169 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
1170#endif
1171 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1172 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->cwnd - old_cwnd, SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_RTX);
1173 }
1174}
1175
1176static void
1177sctp_cwnd_update_after_ecn_echo_common(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net,
1178 int in_window, int num_pkt_lost, int use_rtcc)
1179{
1180 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1181 if ((use_rtcc) && (net->lan_type == SCTP_LAN_LOCAL) && (net->cc_mod.rtcc.use_dccc_ecn)) {
1182 /* Data center Congestion Control */
1183 if (in_window == 0) {
1184 /* Go to CA with the cwnd at the point we sent
1185 * the TSN that was marked with a CE.
1186 */
1187 if (net->ecn_prev_cwnd < net->cwnd) {
1188 /* Restore to prev cwnd */
1189 net->cwnd = net->ecn_prev_cwnd - (net->mtu * num_pkt_lost);
1190 } else {
1191 /* Just cut in 1/2 */
1192 net->cwnd /= 2;
1193 }
1194 /* Drop to CA */
1195 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd - (num_pkt_lost * net->mtu);
1196 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1197 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd), SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SAT);
1198 }
1199 } else {
1200 /* Further tuning down required over the drastic original cut */
1201 net->ssthresh -= (net->mtu * num_pkt_lost);
1202 net->cwnd -= (net->mtu * num_pkt_lost);
1203 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1204 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd), SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SAT);
1205 }
1206 }
1207 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_ecnereducedcwnd);
1208 } else {
1209 if (in_window == 0) {
1210 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_ecnereducedcwnd);
1211 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd / 2;
1212 if (net->ssthresh < net->mtu) {
1213 net->ssthresh = net->mtu;
1214 /* here back off the timer as well, to slow us down */
1215 net->RTO <<= 1;
1216 }
1217 net->cwnd = net->ssthresh;
1218#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1219 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, ecn,
1220 stcb->asoc.my_vtag,
1221 ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)),
1222 net,
1223 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
1224#endif
1225 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1226 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd), SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SAT);
1227 }
1228 }
1229 }
1230
1231}
1232
1233static void
1234sctp_cwnd_update_after_packet_dropped(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1235 struct sctp_nets *net, struct sctp_pktdrop_chunk *cp,
1236 uint32_t *bottle_bw, uint32_t *on_queue)
1237{
1238 uint32_t bw_avail;
1239 unsigned int incr;
1240 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1241
1242 /* get bottle neck bw */
1243 *bottle_bw = ntohl(cp->bottle_bw);
1244 /* and whats on queue */
1245 *on_queue = ntohl(cp->current_onq);
1246 /*
1247 * adjust the on-queue if our flight is more it could be
1248 * that the router has not yet gotten data "in-flight" to it
1249 */
1250 if (*on_queue < net->flight_size) {
1251 *on_queue = net->flight_size;
1252 }
1253 /* rtt is measured in micro seconds, bottle_bw in bytes per second */
1254 bw_avail = (uint32_t)(((uint64_t)(*bottle_bw) * net->rtt) / (uint64_t)1000000);
1255 if (bw_avail > *bottle_bw) {
1256 /*
1257 * Cap the growth to no more than the bottle neck.
1258 * This can happen as RTT slides up due to queues.
1259 * It also means if you have more than a 1 second
1260 * RTT with a empty queue you will be limited to the
1261 * bottle_bw per second no matter if other points
1262 * have 1/2 the RTT and you could get more out...
1263 */
1264 bw_avail = *bottle_bw;
1265 }
1266 if (*on_queue > bw_avail) {
1267 /*
1268 * No room for anything else don't allow anything
1269 * else to be "added to the fire".
1270 */
1271 int seg_inflight, seg_onqueue, my_portion;
1272
1273 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
1274 /* how much are we over queue size? */
1275 incr = *on_queue - bw_avail;
1276 if (stcb->asoc.seen_a_sack_this_pkt) {
1277 /*
1278 * undo any cwnd adjustment that the sack
1279 * might have made
1280 */
1281 net->cwnd = net->prev_cwnd;
1282 }
1283 /* Now how much of that is mine? */
1284 seg_inflight = net->flight_size / net->mtu;
1285 seg_onqueue = *on_queue / net->mtu;
1286 my_portion = (incr * seg_inflight) / seg_onqueue;
1287
1288 /* Have I made an adjustment already */
1289 if (net->cwnd > net->flight_size) {
1290 /*
1291 * for this flight I made an adjustment we
1292 * need to decrease the portion by a share
1293 * our previous adjustment.
1294 */
1295 int diff_adj;
1296
1297 diff_adj = net->cwnd - net->flight_size;
1298 if (diff_adj > my_portion)
1299 my_portion = 0;
1300 else
1301 my_portion -= diff_adj;
1302 }
1303 /*
1304 * back down to the previous cwnd (assume we have
1305 * had a sack before this packet). minus what ever
1306 * portion of the overage is my fault.
1307 */
1308 net->cwnd -= my_portion;
1309
1310 /* we will NOT back down more than 1 MTU */
1311 if (net->cwnd <= net->mtu) {
1312 net->cwnd = net->mtu;
1313 }
1314 /* force into CA */
1315 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd - 1;
1316 } else {
1317 /*
1318 * Take 1/4 of the space left or max burst up ..
1319 * whichever is less.
1320 */
1321 incr = (bw_avail - *on_queue) >> 2;
1322 if ((stcb->asoc.max_burst > 0) &&
1323 (stcb->asoc.max_burst * net->mtu < incr)) {
1324 incr = stcb->asoc.max_burst * net->mtu;
1325 }
1326 net->cwnd += incr;
1327 }
1328 if (net->cwnd > bw_avail) {
1329 /* We can't exceed the pipe size */
1330 net->cwnd = bw_avail;
1331 }
1332 if (net->cwnd < net->mtu) {
1333 /* We always have 1 MTU */
1334 net->cwnd = net->mtu;
1335 }
1336 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
1337 if (net->cwnd - old_cwnd != 0) {
1338 /* log only changes */
1339#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1340 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, pd,
1341 stcb->asoc.my_vtag,
1342 ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)),
1343 net,
1344 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
1345#endif
1346 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1347 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd),
1348 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SAT);
1349 }
1350 }
1351}
1352
1353static void
1354sctp_cwnd_update_after_output(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1355 struct sctp_nets *net, int burst_limit)
1356{
1357 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1358
1359 if (net->ssthresh < net->cwnd)
1360 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd;
1361 if (burst_limit) {
1362 net->cwnd = (net->flight_size + (burst_limit * net->mtu));
1363 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
1364#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1365 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, bl,
1366 stcb->asoc.my_vtag,
1367 ((stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport << 16) | (stcb->rport)),
1368 net,
1369 old_cwnd, net->cwnd);
1370#endif
1371 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1372 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd), SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_BRST);
1373 }
1374 }
1375}
1376
1377static void
1378sctp_cwnd_update_after_sack(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1379 struct sctp_association *asoc,
1380 int accum_moved, int reneged_all, int will_exit)
1381{
1382 /* Passing a zero argument in last disables the rtcc algorithm */
1383 sctp_cwnd_update_after_sack_common(stcb, asoc, accum_moved, reneged_all, will_exit, 0);
1384}
1385
1386static void
1387sctp_cwnd_update_after_ecn_echo(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net,
1388 int in_window, int num_pkt_lost)
1389{
1390 /* Passing a zero argument in last disables the rtcc algorithm */
1391 sctp_cwnd_update_after_ecn_echo_common(stcb, net, in_window, num_pkt_lost, 0);
1392}
1393
1394/* Here starts the RTCCVAR type CC invented by RRS which
1395 * is a slight mod to RFC2581. We reuse a common routine or
1396 * two since these algorithms are so close and need to
1397 * remain the same.
1398 */
1399static void
1400sctp_cwnd_update_rtcc_after_ecn_echo(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net,
1401 int in_window, int num_pkt_lost)
1402{
1403 sctp_cwnd_update_after_ecn_echo_common(stcb, net, in_window, num_pkt_lost, 1);
1404}
1405
1406static void sctp_cwnd_update_rtcc_tsn_acknowledged(struct sctp_nets *net,
1407 struct sctp_tmit_chunk *tp1)
1408{
1409 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes += tp1->send_size;
1410}
1411
1412static void
1413sctp_cwnd_prepare_rtcc_net_for_sack(struct sctp_tcb *stcb SCTP_UNUSED,
1414 struct sctp_nets *net)
1415{
1416 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls_needs_set > 0) {
1417 /* We had a bw measurment going on */
1418 struct timeval ltls;
1419 SCTP_GETPTIME_TIMEVAL(&ltls);
1420 timevalsub(&ltls, &net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls);
1421 net->cc_mod.rtcc.new_tot_time = (ltls.tv_sec * 1000000) + ltls.tv_usec;
1422 }
1423}
1424
1425static void
1426sctp_cwnd_new_rtcc_transmission_begins(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1427 struct sctp_nets *net)
1428{
1429#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1430 uint64_t vtag, probepoint;
1431
1432#endif
1433 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw) {
1434#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1435 /* Clear the old bw.. we went to 0 in-flight */
1436 vtag = (net->rtt << 32) | (((uint32_t)(stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport)) << 16) |
1437 (stcb->rport);
1438 probepoint = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << 32);
1439 /* Probe point 8 */
1440 probepoint |= ((8 << 16) | 0);
1441 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
1442 vtag,
1443 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw << 32) | 0),
1444 ((net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt << 32) | net->rtt),
1445 net->flight_size,
1446 probepoint);
1447#endif
1448 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt = 0;
1449 net->cc_mod.rtcc.cwnd_at_bw_set = 0;
1450 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw = 0;
1451 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes_at_last_rttc = 0;
1452 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce = 0;
1453 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_tot_time = 0;
1454 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes = 0;
1455 net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls_needs_set = 0;
1456 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step) {
1457 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce = 0;
1458 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
1459 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 0;
1460 }
1461 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.ret_from_eq) {
1462 /* less aggressive one - reset cwnd too */
1463 uint32_t cwnd_in_mtu, cwnd;
1464
1465 cwnd_in_mtu = SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_initial_cwnd);
1466 if (cwnd_in_mtu == 0) {
1467 /* Using 0 means that the value of RFC 4960 is used. */
1468 cwnd = min((net->mtu * 4), max((2 * net->mtu), SCTP_INITIAL_CWND));
1469 } else {
1470 /*
1471 * We take the minimum of the burst limit and the
1472 * initial congestion window.
1473 */
1474 if ((stcb->asoc.max_burst > 0) && (cwnd_in_mtu > stcb->asoc.max_burst))
1475 cwnd_in_mtu = stcb->asoc.max_burst;
1476 cwnd = (net->mtu - sizeof(struct sctphdr)) * cwnd_in_mtu;
1477 }
1478 if (net->cwnd > cwnd) {
1479 /* Only set if we are not a timeout (i.e. down to 1 mtu) */
1480 net->cwnd = cwnd;
1481 }
1482 }
1483 }
1484}
1485
1486static void
1487sctp_set_rtcc_initial_cc_param(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1488 struct sctp_nets *net)
1489{
1490#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1491 uint64_t vtag, probepoint;
1492
1493#endif
1494 sctp_set_initial_cc_param(stcb, net);
1495 stcb->asoc.use_precise_time = 1;
1496#if defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__Userspace__)
1497 probepoint = (((uint64_t)net->cwnd) << 32);
1498 probepoint |= ((9 << 16) | 0);
1499 vtag = (net->rtt << 32) |
1500 (((uint32_t)(stcb->sctp_ep->sctp_lport)) << 16) |
1501 (stcb->rport);
1502 SDT_PROBE5(sctp, cwnd, net, rttvar,
1503 vtag,
1504 0,
1505 0,
1506 0,
1507 probepoint);
1508#endif
1509 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw_rtt = 0;
1510 net->cc_mod.rtcc.cwnd_at_bw_set = 0;
1511 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce = 0;
1512 net->cc_mod.rtcc.lbw = 0;
1513 net->cc_mod.rtcc.vol_reduce = 0;
1514 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes_at_last_rttc = 0;
1515 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_tot_time = 0;
1516 net->cc_mod.rtcc.bw_bytes = 0;
1517 net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls_needs_set = 0;
1518 net->cc_mod.rtcc.ret_from_eq = SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_rttvar_eqret);
1519 net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step = SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_steady_step);
1520 net->cc_mod.rtcc.use_dccc_ecn = SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_use_dccc_ecn);
1521 net->cc_mod.rtcc.step_cnt = 0;
1522 net->cc_mod.rtcc.last_step_state = 0;
1523}
1524
1525static int
1526sctp_cwnd_rtcc_socket_option(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, int setorget,
1527 struct sctp_cc_option *cc_opt)
1528{
1529 struct sctp_nets *net;
1530
1531 if (setorget == 1) {
1532 /* a set */
1533 if (cc_opt->option == SCTP_CC_OPT_RTCC_SETMODE) {
1534 if ((cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value != 0) &&
1535 (cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value != 1)) {
1536 return (EINVAL);
1537 }
1538 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &stcb->asoc.nets, sctp_next) {
1539 net->cc_mod.rtcc.ret_from_eq = cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value;
1540 }
1541 } else if (cc_opt->option == SCTP_CC_OPT_USE_DCCC_ECN) {
1542 if ((cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value != 0) &&
1543 (cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value != 1)) {
1544 return (EINVAL);
1545 }
1546 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &stcb->asoc.nets, sctp_next) {
1547 net->cc_mod.rtcc.use_dccc_ecn = cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value;
1548 }
1549 } else if (cc_opt->option == SCTP_CC_OPT_STEADY_STEP) {
1550 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &stcb->asoc.nets, sctp_next) {
1551 net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step = cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value;
1552 }
1553 } else {
1554 return (EINVAL);
1555 }
1556 } else {
1557 /* a get */
1558 if (cc_opt->option == SCTP_CC_OPT_RTCC_SETMODE) {
1559 net = TAILQ_FIRST(&stcb->asoc.nets);
1560 if (net == NULL) {
1561 return (EFAULT);
1562 }
1563 cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value = net->cc_mod.rtcc.ret_from_eq;
1564 } else if (cc_opt->option == SCTP_CC_OPT_USE_DCCC_ECN) {
1565 net = TAILQ_FIRST(&stcb->asoc.nets);
1566 if (net == NULL) {
1567 return (EFAULT);
1568 }
1569 cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value = net->cc_mod.rtcc.use_dccc_ecn;
1570 } else if (cc_opt->option == SCTP_CC_OPT_STEADY_STEP) {
1571 net = TAILQ_FIRST(&stcb->asoc.nets);
1572 if (net == NULL) {
1573 return (EFAULT);
1574 }
1575 cc_opt->aid_value.assoc_value = net->cc_mod.rtcc.steady_step;
1576 } else {
1577 return (EINVAL);
1578 }
1579 }
1580 return (0);
1581}
1582
1583static void
1584sctp_cwnd_update_rtcc_packet_transmitted(struct sctp_tcb *stcb SCTP_UNUSED,
1585 struct sctp_nets *net)
1586{
1587 if (net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls_needs_set == 0) {
1588 SCTP_GETPTIME_TIMEVAL(&net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls);
1589 net->cc_mod.rtcc.tls_needs_set = 2;
1590 }
1591}
1592
1593static void
1594sctp_cwnd_update_rtcc_after_sack(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1595 struct sctp_association *asoc,
1596 int accum_moved, int reneged_all, int will_exit)
1597{
1598 /* Passing a one argument at the last enables the rtcc algorithm */
1599 sctp_cwnd_update_after_sack_common(stcb, asoc, accum_moved, reneged_all, will_exit, 1);
1600}
1601
1602static void
1603sctp_rtt_rtcc_calculated(struct sctp_tcb *stcb SCTP_UNUSED,
1604 struct sctp_nets *net,
1605 struct timeval *now SCTP_UNUSED)
1606{
1607 net->cc_mod.rtcc.rtt_set_this_sack = 1;
1608}
1609
1610/* Here starts Sally Floyds HS-TCP */
1611
1612struct sctp_hs_raise_drop {
1613 int32_t cwnd;
1614 int8_t increase;
1615 int8_t drop_percent;
1616};
1617
1618#define SCTP_HS_TABLE_SIZE 73
1619
1620static const struct sctp_hs_raise_drop sctp_cwnd_adjust[SCTP_HS_TABLE_SIZE] = {
1621 {38, 1, 50}, /* 0 */
1622 {118, 2, 44}, /* 1 */
1623 {221, 3, 41}, /* 2 */
1624 {347, 4, 38}, /* 3 */
1625 {495, 5, 37}, /* 4 */
1626 {663, 6, 35}, /* 5 */
1627 {851, 7, 34}, /* 6 */
1628 {1058, 8, 33}, /* 7 */
1629 {1284, 9, 32}, /* 8 */
1630 {1529, 10, 31}, /* 9 */
1631 {1793, 11, 30}, /* 10 */
1632 {2076, 12, 29}, /* 11 */
1633 {2378, 13, 28}, /* 12 */
1634 {2699, 14, 28}, /* 13 */
1635 {3039, 15, 27}, /* 14 */
1636 {3399, 16, 27}, /* 15 */
1637 {3778, 17, 26}, /* 16 */
1638 {4177, 18, 26}, /* 17 */
1639 {4596, 19, 25}, /* 18 */
1640 {5036, 20, 25}, /* 19 */
1641 {5497, 21, 24}, /* 20 */
1642 {5979, 22, 24}, /* 21 */
1643 {6483, 23, 23}, /* 22 */
1644 {7009, 24, 23}, /* 23 */
1645 {7558, 25, 22}, /* 24 */
1646 {8130, 26, 22}, /* 25 */
1647 {8726, 27, 22}, /* 26 */
1648 {9346, 28, 21}, /* 27 */
1649 {9991, 29, 21}, /* 28 */
1650 {10661, 30, 21}, /* 29 */
1651 {11358, 31, 20}, /* 30 */
1652 {12082, 32, 20}, /* 31 */
1653 {12834, 33, 20}, /* 32 */
1654 {13614, 34, 19}, /* 33 */
1655 {14424, 35, 19}, /* 34 */
1656 {15265, 36, 19}, /* 35 */
1657 {16137, 37, 19}, /* 36 */
1658 {17042, 38, 18}, /* 37 */
1659 {17981, 39, 18}, /* 38 */
1660 {18955, 40, 18}, /* 39 */
1661 {19965, 41, 17}, /* 40 */
1662 {21013, 42, 17}, /* 41 */
1663 {22101, 43, 17}, /* 42 */
1664 {23230, 44, 17}, /* 43 */
1665 {24402, 45, 16}, /* 44 */
1666 {25618, 46, 16}, /* 45 */
1667 {26881, 47, 16}, /* 46 */
1668 {28193, 48, 16}, /* 47 */
1669 {29557, 49, 15}, /* 48 */
1670 {30975, 50, 15}, /* 49 */
1671 {32450, 51, 15}, /* 50 */
1672 {33986, 52, 15}, /* 51 */
1673 {35586, 53, 14}, /* 52 */
1674 {37253, 54, 14}, /* 53 */
1675 {38992, 55, 14}, /* 54 */
1676 {40808, 56, 14}, /* 55 */
1677 {42707, 57, 13}, /* 56 */
1678 {44694, 58, 13}, /* 57 */
1679 {46776, 59, 13}, /* 58 */
1680 {48961, 60, 13}, /* 59 */
1681 {51258, 61, 13}, /* 60 */
1682 {53677, 62, 12}, /* 61 */
1683 {56230, 63, 12}, /* 62 */
1684 {58932, 64, 12}, /* 63 */
1685 {61799, 65, 12}, /* 64 */
1686 {64851, 66, 11}, /* 65 */
1687 {68113, 67, 11}, /* 66 */
1688 {71617, 68, 11}, /* 67 */
1689 {75401, 69, 10}, /* 68 */
1690 {79517, 70, 10}, /* 69 */
1691 {84035, 71, 10}, /* 70 */
1692 {89053, 72, 10}, /* 71 */
1693 {94717, 73, 9} /* 72 */
1694};
1695
1696static void
1697sctp_hs_cwnd_increase(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
1698{
1699 int cur_val, i, indx, incr;
1700 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1701
1702 cur_val = net->cwnd >> 10;
1703 indx = SCTP_HS_TABLE_SIZE - 1;
1704
1705 if (cur_val < sctp_cwnd_adjust[0].cwnd) {
1706 /* normal mode */
1707 if (net->net_ack > net->mtu) {
1708 net->cwnd += net->mtu;
1709 } else {
1710 net->cwnd += net->net_ack;
1711 }
1712 } else {
1713 for (i = net->last_hs_used; i < SCTP_HS_TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
1714 if (cur_val < sctp_cwnd_adjust[i].cwnd) {
1715 indx = i;
1716 break;
1717 }
1718 }
1719 net->last_hs_used = indx;
1720 incr = (((int32_t)sctp_cwnd_adjust[indx].increase) << 10);
1721 net->cwnd += incr;
1722 }
1723 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
1724 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1725 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd), SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SS);
1726 }
1727}
1728
1729static void
1730sctp_hs_cwnd_decrease(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
1731{
1732 int cur_val, i, indx;
1733 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
1734
1735 cur_val = net->cwnd >> 10;
1736 if (cur_val < sctp_cwnd_adjust[0].cwnd) {
1737 /* normal mode */
1738 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd / 2;
1739 if (net->ssthresh < (net->mtu * 2)) {
1740 net->ssthresh = 2 * net->mtu;
1741 }
1742 net->cwnd = net->ssthresh;
1743 } else {
1744 /* drop by the proper amount */
1745 net->ssthresh = net->cwnd - (int)((net->cwnd / 100) *
1746 (int32_t)sctp_cwnd_adjust[net->last_hs_used].drop_percent);
1747 net->cwnd = net->ssthresh;
1748 /* now where are we */
1749 indx = net->last_hs_used;
1750 cur_val = net->cwnd >> 10;
1751 /* reset where we are in the table */
1752 if (cur_val < sctp_cwnd_adjust[0].cwnd) {
1753 /* feel out of hs */
1754 net->last_hs_used = 0;
1755 } else {
1756 for (i = indx; i >= 1; i--) {
1757 if (cur_val > sctp_cwnd_adjust[i - 1].cwnd) {
1758 break;
1759 }
1760 }
1761 net->last_hs_used = indx;
1762 }
1763 }
1764 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
1765 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1766 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd), SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_FR);
1767 }
1768}
1769
1770static void
1771sctp_hs_cwnd_update_after_fr(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1772 struct sctp_association *asoc)
1773{
1774 struct sctp_nets *net;
1775 /*
1776 * CMT fast recovery code. Need to debug. ((sctp_cmt_on_off > 0) &&
1777 * (net->fast_retran_loss_recovery == 0)))
1778 */
1779 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &asoc->nets, sctp_next) {
1780 if ((asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery == 0) ||
1781 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off > 0)) {
1782 /* out of a RFC2582 Fast recovery window? */
1783 if (net->net_ack > 0) {
1784 /*
1785 * per section 7.2.3, are there any
1786 * destinations that had a fast retransmit
1787 * to them. If so what we need to do is
1788 * adjust ssthresh and cwnd.
1789 */
1790 struct sctp_tmit_chunk *lchk;
1791
1792 sctp_hs_cwnd_decrease(stcb, net);
1793
1794 lchk = TAILQ_FIRST(&asoc->send_queue);
1795
1796 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
1797 /* Turn on fast recovery window */
1798 asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery = 1;
1799 if (lchk == NULL) {
1800 /* Mark end of the window */
1801 asoc->fast_recovery_tsn = asoc->sending_seq - 1;
1802 } else {
1803 asoc->fast_recovery_tsn = lchk->rec.data.tsn - 1;
1804 }
1805
1806 /*
1807 * CMT fast recovery -- per destination
1808 * recovery variable.
1809 */
1810 net->fast_retran_loss_recovery = 1;
1811
1812 if (lchk == NULL) {
1813 /* Mark end of the window */
1814 net->fast_recovery_tsn = asoc->sending_seq - 1;
1815 } else {
1816 net->fast_recovery_tsn = lchk->rec.data.tsn - 1;
1817 }
1818
1819 sctp_timer_stop(SCTP_TIMER_TYPE_SEND,
1820 stcb->sctp_ep, stcb, net,
1821 SCTP_FROM_SCTP_CC_FUNCTIONS + SCTP_LOC_2);
1822 sctp_timer_start(SCTP_TIMER_TYPE_SEND,
1823 stcb->sctp_ep, stcb, net);
1824 }
1825 } else if (net->net_ack > 0) {
1826 /*
1827 * Mark a peg that we WOULD have done a cwnd
1828 * reduction but RFC2582 prevented this action.
1829 */
1830 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_fastretransinrtt);
1831 }
1832 }
1833}
1834
1835static void
1836sctp_hs_cwnd_update_after_sack(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
1837 struct sctp_association *asoc,
1838 int accum_moved, int reneged_all SCTP_UNUSED, int will_exit)
1839{
1840 struct sctp_nets *net;
1841 /******************************/
1842 /* update cwnd and Early FR */
1843 /******************************/
1844 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &asoc->nets, sctp_next) {
1845#ifdef JANA_CMT_FAST_RECOVERY
1846 /*
1847 * CMT fast recovery code. Need to debug.
1848 */
1849 if (net->fast_retran_loss_recovery && net->new_pseudo_cumack) {
1850 if (SCTP_TSN_GE(asoc->last_acked_seq, net->fast_recovery_tsn) ||
1851 SCTP_TSN_GE(net->pseudo_cumack,net->fast_recovery_tsn)) {
1852 net->will_exit_fast_recovery = 1;
1853 }
1854 }
1855#endif
1856 /* if nothing was acked on this destination skip it */
1857 if (net->net_ack == 0) {
1858 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
1859 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, 0, SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SACK);
1860 }
1861 continue;
1862 }
1863#ifdef JANA_CMT_FAST_RECOVERY
1864 /* CMT fast recovery code
1865 */
1866 /*
1867 if (sctp_cmt_on_off > 0 && net->fast_retran_loss_recovery && net->will_exit_fast_recovery == 0) {
1868 @@@ Do something
1869 }
1870 else if (sctp_cmt_on_off == 0 && asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery && will_exit == 0) {
1871 */
1872#endif
1873
1874 if (asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery &&
1875 (will_exit == 0) &&
1876 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == 0)) {
1877 /*
1878 * If we are in loss recovery we skip any cwnd
1879 * update
1880 */
1881 return;
1882 }
1883 /*
1884 * CMT: CUC algorithm. Update cwnd if pseudo-cumack has
1885 * moved.
1886 */
1887 if (accum_moved ||
1888 ((asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off > 0) && net->new_pseudo_cumack)) {
1889 /* If the cumulative ack moved we can proceed */
1890 if (net->cwnd <= net->ssthresh) {
1891 /* We are in slow start */
1892 if (net->flight_size + net->net_ack >= net->cwnd) {
1893 sctp_hs_cwnd_increase(stcb, net);
1894 } else {
1895 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
1896 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->net_ack,
1897 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NOADV_SS);
1898 }
1899 }
1900 } else {
1901 /* We are in congestion avoidance */
1902 net->partial_bytes_acked += net->net_ack;
1903 if ((net->flight_size + net->net_ack >= net->cwnd) &&
1904 (net->partial_bytes_acked >= net->cwnd)) {
1905 net->partial_bytes_acked -= net->cwnd;
1906 net->cwnd += net->mtu;
1907 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(asoc, net);
1908 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
1909 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->mtu,
1910 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_CA);
1911 }
1912 } else {
1913 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
1914 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->net_ack,
1915 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NOADV_CA);
1916 }
1917 }
1918 }
1919 } else {
1920 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
1921 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->mtu,
1922 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NO_CUMACK);
1923 }
1924 }
1925 }
1926}
1927
1928/*
1929 * H-TCP congestion control. The algorithm is detailed in:
1930 * R.N.Shorten, D.J.Leith:
1931 * "H-TCP: TCP for high-speed and long-distance networks"
1932 * Proc. PFLDnet, Argonne, 2004.
1933 * http://www.hamilton.ie/net/htcp3.pdf
1934 */
1935
1936static int use_rtt_scaling = 1;
1937static int use_bandwidth_switch = 1;
1938
1939static inline int
1940between(uint32_t seq1, uint32_t seq2, uint32_t seq3)
1941{
1942 return (seq3 - seq2 >= seq1 - seq2);
1943}
1944
1945static inline uint32_t
1946htcp_cong_time(struct htcp *ca)
1947{
1948 return (sctp_get_tick_count() - ca->last_cong);
1949}
1950
1951static inline uint32_t
1952htcp_ccount(struct htcp *ca)
1953{
1954 return (ca->minRTT == 0 ? htcp_cong_time(ca) : htcp_cong_time(ca)/ca->minRTT);
1955}
1956
1957static inline void
1958htcp_reset(struct htcp *ca)
1959{
1960 ca->undo_last_cong = ca->last_cong;
1961 ca->undo_maxRTT = ca->maxRTT;
1962 ca->undo_old_maxB = ca->old_maxB;
1963 ca->last_cong = sctp_get_tick_count();
1964}
1965
1966#ifdef SCTP_NOT_USED
1967
1968static uint32_t
1969htcp_cwnd_undo(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
1970{
1971 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.last_cong = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.undo_last_cong;
1972 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.undo_maxRTT;
1973 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.old_maxB = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.undo_old_maxB;
1974 return (max(net->cwnd, ((net->ssthresh/net->mtu<<7)/net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.beta)*net->mtu));
1975}
1976
1977#endif
1978
1979static inline void
1980measure_rtt(struct sctp_nets *net)
1981{
1982 uint32_t srtt = net->lastsa>>SCTP_RTT_SHIFT;
1983
1984 /* keep track of minimum RTT seen so far, minRTT is zero at first */
1985 if (net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT > srtt || !net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT)
1986 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT = srtt;
1987
1988 /* max RTT */
1989 if (net->fast_retran_ip == 0 && net->ssthresh < 0xFFFF && htcp_ccount(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca) > 3) {
1990 if (net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT < net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT)
1991 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT;
1992 if (net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT < srtt && srtt <= net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT+sctp_msecs_to_ticks(20))
1993 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT = srtt;
1994 }
1995}
1996
1997static void
1998measure_achieved_throughput(struct sctp_nets *net)
1999{
2000 uint32_t now = sctp_get_tick_count();
2001
2002 if (net->fast_retran_ip == 0)
2003 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytes_acked = net->net_ack;
2004
2005 if (!use_bandwidth_switch)
2006 return;
2007
2008 /* achieved throughput calculations */
2009 /* JRS - not 100% sure of this statement */
2010 if (net->fast_retran_ip == 1) {
2011 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytecount = 0;
2012 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.lasttime = now;
2013 return;
2014 }
2015
2016 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytecount += net->net_ack;
2017 if ((net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytecount >= net->cwnd - (((net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.alpha >> 7) ? (net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.alpha >> 7) : 1) * net->mtu)) &&
2018 (now - net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.lasttime >= net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT) &&
2019 (net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT > 0)) {
2020 uint32_t cur_Bi = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytecount/net->mtu*hz/(now - net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.lasttime);
2021
2022 if (htcp_ccount(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca) <= 3) {
2023 /* just after backoff */
2024 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minB = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxB = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.Bi = cur_Bi;
2025 } else {
2026 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.Bi = (3*net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.Bi + cur_Bi)/4;
2027 if (net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.Bi > net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxB)
2028 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxB = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.Bi;
2029 if (net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minB > net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxB)
2030 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minB = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxB;
2031 }
2032 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytecount = 0;
2033 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.lasttime = now;
2034 }
2035}
2036
2037static inline void
2038htcp_beta_update(struct htcp *ca, uint32_t minRTT, uint32_t maxRTT)
2039{
2040 if (use_bandwidth_switch) {
2041 uint32_t maxB = ca->maxB;
2042 uint32_t old_maxB = ca->old_maxB;
2043 ca->old_maxB = ca->maxB;
2044
2045 if (!between(5*maxB, 4*old_maxB, 6*old_maxB)) {
2046 ca->beta = BETA_MIN;
2047 ca->modeswitch = 0;
2048 return;
2049 }
2050 }
2051
2052 if (ca->modeswitch && minRTT > sctp_msecs_to_ticks(10) && maxRTT) {
2053 ca->beta = (minRTT<<7)/maxRTT;
2054 if (ca->beta < BETA_MIN)
2055 ca->beta = BETA_MIN;
2056 else if (ca->beta > BETA_MAX)
2057 ca->beta = BETA_MAX;
2058 } else {
2059 ca->beta = BETA_MIN;
2060 ca->modeswitch = 1;
2061 }
2062}
2063
2064static inline void
2065htcp_alpha_update(struct htcp *ca)
2066{
2067 uint32_t minRTT = ca->minRTT;
2068 uint32_t factor = 1;
2069 uint32_t diff = htcp_cong_time(ca);
2070
2071 if (diff > (uint32_t)hz) {
2072 diff -= hz;
2073 factor = 1+ (10 * diff + ((diff / 2) * (diff / 2) / hz)) / hz;
2074 }
2075
2076 if (use_rtt_scaling && minRTT) {
2077 uint32_t scale = (hz << 3) / (10 * minRTT);
2078 scale = min(max(scale, 1U << 2), 10U << 3); /* clamping ratio to interval [0.5,10]<<3 */
2079 factor = (factor << 3) / scale;
2080 if (factor != 0)
2081 factor = 1;
2082 }
2083
2084 ca->alpha = 2 * factor * ((1 << 7) - ca->beta);
2085 if (ca->alpha != 0)
2086 ca->alpha = ALPHA_BASE;
2087}
2088
2089/* After we have the rtt data to calculate beta, we'd still prefer to wait one
2090 * rtt before we adjust our beta to ensure we are working from a consistent
2091 * data.
2092 *
2093 * This function should be called when we hit a congestion event since only at
2094 * that point do we really have a real sense of maxRTT (the queues en route
2095 * were getting just too full now).
2096 */
2097static void
2098htcp_param_update(struct sctp_nets *net)
2099{
2100 uint32_t minRTT = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.minRTT;
2101 uint32_t maxRTT = net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT;
2102
2103 htcp_beta_update(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca, minRTT, maxRTT);
2104 htcp_alpha_update(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca);
2105
2106 /* add slowly fading memory for maxRTT to accommodate routing changes etc */
2107 if (minRTT > 0 && maxRTT > minRTT)
2108 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.maxRTT = minRTT + ((maxRTT-minRTT)*95)/100;
2109}
2110
2111static uint32_t
2112htcp_recalc_ssthresh(struct sctp_nets *net)
2113{
2114 htcp_param_update(net);
2115 return (max(((net->cwnd/net->mtu * net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.beta) >> 7)*net->mtu, 2U*net->mtu));
2116}
2117
2118static void
2119htcp_cong_avoid(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
2120{
2121 /*-
2122 * How to handle these functions?
2123 * if (!tcp_is_cwnd_limited(sk, in_flight)) RRS - good question.
2124 * return;
2125 */
2126 if (net->cwnd <= net->ssthresh) {
2127 /* We are in slow start */
2128 if (net->flight_size + net->net_ack >= net->cwnd) {
2129 if (net->net_ack > (net->mtu * SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_L2_abc_variable))) {
2130 net->cwnd += (net->mtu * SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_L2_abc_variable));
2131 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
2132 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->mtu,
2133 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SS);
2134 }
2135
2136 } else {
2137 net->cwnd += net->net_ack;
2138 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
2139 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->net_ack,
2140 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SS);
2141 }
2142 }
2143 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
2144 } else {
2145 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
2146 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->net_ack,
2147 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NOADV_SS);
2148 }
2149 }
2150 } else {
2151 measure_rtt(net);
2152
2153 /* In dangerous area, increase slowly.
2154 * In theory this is net->cwnd += alpha / net->cwnd
2155 */
2156 /* What is snd_cwnd_cnt?? */
2157 if (((net->partial_bytes_acked/net->mtu * net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.alpha) >> 7)*net->mtu >= net->cwnd) {
2158 /*-
2159 * Does SCTP have a cwnd clamp?
2160 * if (net->snd_cwnd < net->snd_cwnd_clamp) - Nope (RRS).
2161 */
2162 net->cwnd += net->mtu;
2163 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
2164 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
2165 htcp_alpha_update(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca);
2166 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
2167 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->mtu,
2168 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_CA);
2169 }
2170 } else {
2171 net->partial_bytes_acked += net->net_ack;
2172 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
2173 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->net_ack,
2174 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NOADV_CA);
2175 }
2176 }
2177
2178 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytes_acked = net->mtu;
2179 }
2180}
2181
2182#ifdef SCTP_NOT_USED
2183/* Lower bound on congestion window. */
2184static uint32_t
2185htcp_min_cwnd(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
2186{
2187 return (net->ssthresh);
2188}
2189#endif
2190
2191static void
2192htcp_init(struct sctp_nets *net)
2193{
2194 memset(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca, 0, sizeof(struct htcp));
2195 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.alpha = ALPHA_BASE;
2196 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.beta = BETA_MIN;
2197 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.bytes_acked = net->mtu;
2198 net->cc_mod.htcp_ca.last_cong = sctp_get_tick_count();
2199}
2200
2201static void
2202sctp_htcp_set_initial_cc_param(struct sctp_tcb *stcb, struct sctp_nets *net)
2203{
2204 /*
2205 * We take the max of the burst limit times a MTU or the
2206 * INITIAL_CWND. We then limit this to 4 MTU's of sending.
2207 */
2208 net->cwnd = min((net->mtu * 4), max((2 * net->mtu), SCTP_INITIAL_CWND));
2209 net->ssthresh = stcb->asoc.peers_rwnd;
2210 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
2211 htcp_init(net);
2212
2213 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & (SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE|SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE)) {
2214 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, 0, SCTP_CWND_INITIALIZATION);
2215 }
2216}
2217
2218static void
2219sctp_htcp_cwnd_update_after_sack(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
2220 struct sctp_association *asoc,
2221 int accum_moved, int reneged_all SCTP_UNUSED, int will_exit)
2222{
2223 struct sctp_nets *net;
2224
2225 /******************************/
2226 /* update cwnd and Early FR */
2227 /******************************/
2228 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &asoc->nets, sctp_next) {
2229#ifdef JANA_CMT_FAST_RECOVERY
2230 /*
2231 * CMT fast recovery code. Need to debug.
2232 */
2233 if (net->fast_retran_loss_recovery && net->new_pseudo_cumack) {
2234 if (SCTP_TSN_GE(asoc->last_acked_seq, net->fast_recovery_tsn) ||
2235 SCTP_TSN_GE(net->pseudo_cumack,net->fast_recovery_tsn)) {
2236 net->will_exit_fast_recovery = 1;
2237 }
2238 }
2239#endif
2240 /* if nothing was acked on this destination skip it */
2241 if (net->net_ack == 0) {
2242 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
2243 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, 0, SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SACK);
2244 }
2245 continue;
2246 }
2247#ifdef JANA_CMT_FAST_RECOVERY
2248 /* CMT fast recovery code
2249 */
2250 /*
2251 if (sctp_cmt_on_off > 0 && net->fast_retran_loss_recovery && net->will_exit_fast_recovery == 0) {
2252 @@@ Do something
2253 }
2254 else if (sctp_cmt_on_off == 0 && asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery && will_exit == 0) {
2255 */
2256#endif
2257
2258 if (asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery &&
2259 will_exit == 0 &&
2260 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off == 0)) {
2261 /*
2262 * If we are in loss recovery we skip any cwnd
2263 * update
2264 */
2265 return;
2266 }
2267 /*
2268 * CMT: CUC algorithm. Update cwnd if pseudo-cumack has
2269 * moved.
2270 */
2271 if (accum_moved ||
2272 ((asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off > 0) && net->new_pseudo_cumack)) {
2273 htcp_cong_avoid(stcb, net);
2274 measure_achieved_throughput(net);
2275 } else {
2276 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_LOGGING_ENABLE) {
2277 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->mtu,
2278 SCTP_CWND_LOG_NO_CUMACK);
2279 }
2280 }
2281 }
2282}
2283
2284static void
2285sctp_htcp_cwnd_update_after_fr(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
2286 struct sctp_association *asoc)
2287{
2288 struct sctp_nets *net;
2289 /*
2290 * CMT fast recovery code. Need to debug. ((sctp_cmt_on_off > 0) &&
2291 * (net->fast_retran_loss_recovery == 0)))
2292 */
2293 TAILQ_FOREACH(net, &asoc->nets, sctp_next) {
2294 if ((asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery == 0) ||
2295 (asoc->sctp_cmt_on_off > 0)) {
2296 /* out of a RFC2582 Fast recovery window? */
2297 if (net->net_ack > 0) {
2298 /*
2299 * per section 7.2.3, are there any
2300 * destinations that had a fast retransmit
2301 * to them. If so what we need to do is
2302 * adjust ssthresh and cwnd.
2303 */
2304 struct sctp_tmit_chunk *lchk;
2305 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
2306
2307 /* JRS - reset as if state were changed */
2308 htcp_reset(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca);
2309 net->ssthresh = htcp_recalc_ssthresh(net);
2310 net->cwnd = net->ssthresh;
2311 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(asoc, net);
2312 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
2313 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd),
2314 SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_FR);
2315 }
2316 lchk = TAILQ_FIRST(&asoc->send_queue);
2317
2318 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
2319 /* Turn on fast recovery window */
2320 asoc->fast_retran_loss_recovery = 1;
2321 if (lchk == NULL) {
2322 /* Mark end of the window */
2323 asoc->fast_recovery_tsn = asoc->sending_seq - 1;
2324 } else {
2325 asoc->fast_recovery_tsn = lchk->rec.data.tsn - 1;
2326 }
2327
2328 /*
2329 * CMT fast recovery -- per destination
2330 * recovery variable.
2331 */
2332 net->fast_retran_loss_recovery = 1;
2333
2334 if (lchk == NULL) {
2335 /* Mark end of the window */
2336 net->fast_recovery_tsn = asoc->sending_seq - 1;
2337 } else {
2338 net->fast_recovery_tsn = lchk->rec.data.tsn - 1;
2339 }
2340
2341 sctp_timer_stop(SCTP_TIMER_TYPE_SEND,
2342 stcb->sctp_ep, stcb, net,
2343 SCTP_FROM_SCTP_CC_FUNCTIONS + SCTP_LOC_3);
2344 sctp_timer_start(SCTP_TIMER_TYPE_SEND,
2345 stcb->sctp_ep, stcb, net);
2346 }
2347 } else if (net->net_ack > 0) {
2348 /*
2349 * Mark a peg that we WOULD have done a cwnd
2350 * reduction but RFC2582 prevented this action.
2351 */
2352 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_fastretransinrtt);
2353 }
2354 }
2355}
2356
2357static void
2358sctp_htcp_cwnd_update_after_timeout(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
2359 struct sctp_nets *net)
2360{
2361 int old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
2362
2363 /* JRS - reset as if the state were being changed to timeout */
2364 htcp_reset(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca);
2365 net->ssthresh = htcp_recalc_ssthresh(net);
2366 net->cwnd = net->mtu;
2367 net->partial_bytes_acked = 0;
2368 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
2369 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, net->cwnd - old_cwnd, SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_RTX);
2370 }
2371}
2372
2373static void
2374sctp_htcp_cwnd_update_after_ecn_echo(struct sctp_tcb *stcb,
2375 struct sctp_nets *net, int in_window, int num_pkt_lost SCTP_UNUSED)
2376{
2377 int old_cwnd;
2378 old_cwnd = net->cwnd;
2379
2380 /* JRS - reset hctp as if state changed */
2381 if (in_window == 0) {
2382 htcp_reset(&net->cc_mod.htcp_ca);
2383 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_ecnereducedcwnd);
2384 net->ssthresh = htcp_recalc_ssthresh(net);
2385 if (net->ssthresh < net->mtu) {
2386 net->ssthresh = net->mtu;
2387 /* here back off the timer as well, to slow us down */
2388 net->RTO <<= 1;
2389 }
2390 net->cwnd = net->ssthresh;
2391 sctp_enforce_cwnd_limit(&stcb->asoc, net);
2392 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_logging_level) & SCTP_CWND_MONITOR_ENABLE) {
2393 sctp_log_cwnd(stcb, net, (net->cwnd - old_cwnd), SCTP_CWND_LOG_FROM_SAT);
2394 }
2395 }
2396}
